products.title: PEACH NECTARINE
products.description: Sweet peach nectar, dewy greens, and blooming nectarine blossoms enhanced with apricot and warm touches of soft peach wood.

products.title: WARM TOBACCO PIPE | REED DIFFUSER
products.description: Warm Tobacco and brushed suede meld with aromatic greens, soft weathered woods, earthy patchouli and smoky leather.

products.title: WOODSMOKE BOURBON
products.description: Dark, amber notes of oak aged bourbon spun gently with smoked vanilla bean,  hickory, and touches of birch wood, enhanced with crushed black peppercorn, spicy nutmeg, and golden clove bud.

products.title: WARM TOBACCO PIPE
products.description: This is for all the latest trends, no matter what.

products.title: WARM TOBACCO PIPE | ROOM & LINEN SPRAY
products.description: Warm Tobacco and brushed suede meld with aromatic greens, soft weathered woods, earthy patchouli and smoky leather.

products.title: TOBACCO LEAF
products.description: Warm, aromatic, slightly herbal notes of green tobacco leaf are accented with oak and oud wood over a fleeting hint of rain-soaked, freshly turned black earth.
